posts.post_title: WTB or trade more Detroit players OJ n172
posts.post_content: Campau, OJ book. 62.1, 62,2, 62.3, 62.5, Goodfellow 195.3, 195.4, 195.5.             Scheibeck 399.2, 399.3, 399.4, 399.5   Have a Detroit HOF Thompson to trade      Thanks Joe.   More trade cards. Ed Beatin 24.2 Cleveland, Fred Dunlap 138.4, 138.6. Pittsburg, Henry Gruber 202.3, Cleveland Jimmy Manning 292.3 KC, Sy Sutcliffe 447.4 Cleveland.   These are all OJ book numbers.
